name: Lightning Bolter
description:
• Explore 3 hand painted worlds.
  • Meet/annoy a multitude of characters who make silly sounds.
  • Learn the ways of energy creation.
  • People will find you more attractive while playing this game.

WASD or arrow keys to move. Press "E" to zap/interact.

☯Notes: If sound does not play on menu screen please refresh. File size is slightly larger than your typical html5 game. Please be patient. :)

---☯
